text: Por Troasan kav nza Sanden Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi fugap, mbe phorga mbɨr za mbui. 20.7 Mbe Zudaiŋ, mben tɨv, mbe khaŋ nzuai, mbe harigi raar kam, ana ra vera vov mpora ndim, ŋkotuguraagen raar kam hi. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nza won tɨva zɨn vov, Sarare ŋkotugar, mbe khaŋ nzuai, ana harigi ŋaaren fharigi raa ma. Por mbe phorga mbegap, ana Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuin mbe phorga nzuai. Ana khaŋ muuŋgiap, ana gurmaŋgip mbe thav ŋgɨrga. Ana maaŋ muuŋgiap, Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuin mbe nzuavra kim, maaŋ vov rɨgafurigi.  20.7 Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ kaŋgiap nta kheri gumgi vhɨrve, mbe kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, mbe Zisas vɨzɨn gum ana fhava sɨga ndɨkndɨgi mba pi.
